ListGenres.summary: A list of all valid event genres.

ListEvents.summary: Multiple event objects with selected fields.

location.description: The location of events you want a listing for.

genre.description: The genre of event type you want listed.

date.description: A specific date you want an events listing for. NB: This parameter is disregarded if date_from and date_to parameters are set in the same request.

date_from.description: The date you want an events listing from. NB: This parameter is required when date_to parameter is set.

date_to.description: The date you want an events listing to. NB: This parameter is required when date_from parameter is set.

venue.description: The venue you want an events listing for.

venue_id.description: The unique identifier for a venue you want an events listing for.

artist.description: The artist you want an events listing for.

artist_id.description: The unique identifier for an artist you want an events listing for.

results_per_page.description: The number of results you want per page/chunk.

page.description: The page/chunk of results to be requested.

incl_image.description: Decides whether or not an event image is included in the response.

full_description.description: Decides whether full or summarised description text is included in the response.

updated_since.description: Only retrive events that have been added/updated since the given date.

GetEvent.summary: An event object with all fields.

id.description: Unique identifier string of the Event you want full details for.

incl_artists.description: Decides whether or not a list of performing artists is included in the response.

incl_images.description: Decides whether or not an event images are included in the response.

incl_tickets.description: Decides whether or not a list of available tickets is included in the response.

full_description.description: Decides whether full or summarised description text is included in the response.

GetEventImage.summary: An event image retrieved as either a JSON object or JPEG image.

id.description: Unique identifier string of the Event you want an image for.

format.description: The format of the response you want back from the resource
